Name: Retrowave Rider
About the game: Drive forward onto the neon-lit road. You will conquer the path before you. Use color-switching powers to reshape the levels to your advantage. Hand-crafted level design A unique mix of runner and puzzle that will keep you on your toes Extra collectibles that unlock customization options for your rider Accessibility support for colorblindness and for people with slower reaction times
